actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on House Administration.

official_title: To provide for interregional primary elections and caucuses for selection of delegates to political party Presidential nominating conventions.
short_title: Interregional Presidential Primary and Caucus Act of 1999

summary.text: Interregional Presidential Primary and Caucus Act of 1999 - Divides the United States into six regions of specified States to provide for interregional primary elections and caucuses, according to a specified order, for selection of delegates to political party presidential and vice presidential national nominating conventions.

titles.title: Interregional Presidential Primary and Caucus Act of 1999
To provide for interregional primary elections and caucuses for selection of delegates to political party Presidential nominating conventions.
